events.message: I have filed a claim for the car accident that occurred last night on Elm Street involving a collision with another vehicle.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing details mentioning the vehicle collision and damages.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your auto accident claim to assist with the process and address any concerns.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding your vehicle accident and will keep you informed during each step.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and any repair estimates for further processing.
All requested documents including the police report and car repair estimates have been submitted successfully.
Our claims team has started a thorough investigation of the auto accident claim using the provided documentation.
The investigation into your vehicle collision has been completed with all findings reviewed carefully.
We have proposed a settlement offer based on assessed damages and coverage limits for your damaged car.
Thank you for your feedback, confirming the proposed settlement offer is fair and in line with the accident damage.
Your auto accident claim has been approved, and the settlement amount has been finalized and authorized.
The settlement payment has been issued to your account for the damages sustained in the vehicle accident.
With the payment processed and agreed upon, your auto accident claim case is now officially closed.
